item.title: Space Codes
item.description: Space Codes is an app that plays custom, curated focus music to help you focus. It’s a simple app that has a few hours of songs I wrote myself, specifically to help people tune out the noise of every day life and fill their minds with simple, moving sounds. üë®‚ÄçüöÄ About me I am an app developer and electronic musician. You can listen to my music by visiting aperspection.com, and you can see my apps here.
